summary:
Steve: “i don’t know if there’s anything i can do to thank you.”
Bucky: “i do. Don’t call me ever again.”
body:
Steve: “i don’t know if there’s anything i can do to thank you.”

Bucky: “i do. Don’t call me ever again.”

blog.name: haveyounotseenthismovieyet
blog.title: HAVEYOUNOTSEENTHISMOVIEYET
blog.description:
"SPOILERS!!!"
This blog is for me to keep track of all the movies I want myself to watch sometime in the future. I also use this blog to keep track of posts that may be (AKA definitely are) spoilers/awesome things I'd like to look at once I've seen the movie.
#e6ebea

blog.name: skwerlly-squirrel
blog.title: Squirrel In Spaaaaaace
blog.description:
Hello all, it me, the Skwerl. (Also Scribs.)

I have a lotta eclectic interests, few of which match. My largest are writing, videogames, space, animals + the earth + their conservation. I used to be a different tumblr but... I was dumb aaaand forgot my password. >.>' Videogames include currently WoW, Destiny 2, Secret World Legends, GW2, FFXIV, Skyrim, and Fallout, plus other assorted. I live that Warrior Life. :D Be good to yourself and have a nice day!

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Where the Line Begins
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Gjcr6S

by BytheDocksofBrooklyn

Steven Grant Rogers has spent the majority of his childhood and teenage years alone. His mother is sick, his father is dead, and the only people that ever keep him company are the hospital staffs, until one morning when he meets a handsome older boy while on his way to school. From there on out he develops his first meaningful friendship, and together the two of them go through all of the typical struggles of young-adult life, including dating, self-discovery, and all of the complex emotions that come with experiencing love, betrayal, hurt, and trust.

Words: 528, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Captain America (Movies), Captain America - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M, Other
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Sarah Rogers
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes & Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Friendship, Bisexual Male Character, Sexuality, 1940s, Brooklyn, winteriron, Stucky - Freeform, Fluff and Angst, Domestic Fluff, Hospitals, Boyfriends, brooklyn 1940s, Betrayal, Crushes, POV Male Character, Male Slash, Pining, Mutual Pining, Light Angst, New York, High School, Sexual Frustration, Crushing, First Kiss, First Love, hero bucky barnes, Pre-Serum, Pre-Serum Steve Rogers, makeout, Drunken Confessions, Drunken Flirting, Sharing a Bed, Steve Rogers Feels, tony stark - Freeform, Bucky Barnes - Freeform, bucky barnes plays the field

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Carve my body into a wrench (make beautiful things with me)
title: Carve my body into a wrench (make beautiful things with me)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2G50PFi

by wilderbeast

“I never actually thought this would happen,” Bucky said, mouth open in shock. “I never actually thought this was even a possibility. You actually burnt water. This is not even scientifically possible, water is meant to evaporate but your actually doing it, you’re burning water.”

Tony laughed dryly, staring down at his melted spatula. “I don’t even know what I was meant to be making.”

“Bread.”

Words: 1094, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of I made my love a cheesecake

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Bakery, Baker!Bucky, no mention of riko the dog in this one but it will come, Fluff and Angst, conversations about giving and taking, mentions of past failure, bucky worries he hasn’t taught Tony anything valuable, tony shoots that down immediately, Idiots in Love, Tony cannnot cook at all, scientifically incorrect things, contrary to what I’ve said in this, you cannot burn water, bucky worries for Tony’s safety, just bucky doing a lot of worrying, some fluff despite everything, Alternate Universe - No Powers, Modern Bucky Barnes

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Bakery, Baker!Bucky, no mention of riko the dog in this one but it will come, Fluff and Angst, conversations about giving and taking, mentions of past failure, bucky worries he hasn’t taught Tony anything valuable, tony shoots that down immediately, Idiots in Love, Tony cannnot cook at all, scientifically incorrect things, contrary to what I’ve said in this, you cannot burn water, bucky worries for Tony’s safety, just bucky doing a lot of worrying, some fluff despite everything, Alternate Universe - No Powers, Modern Bucky Barnes


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2G50PFi

blog.name: missdrake
blog.title: Queen of Imagines
blog.description: Request Aesthetics, scenarios, one shots, headcannons,and preferences. However, Matchups will be limited since Tumblr keeps blocking them. My blog will contain nsfw materials but there will be warnings

summary: Marvel preferences: Being able to defeat them (crush)
title: Marvel preferences: Being able to defeat them (crush)
body:
Galactus (if it makes it any-worse, someone requested a smut fic with him, I am not sure how to feel about this) is a planet eater and many times he has fought you when you were alongside fantastic four, how ironic that the planet he wants to eat so bad, falls for someone who lives in that planet and needs it. Galactus spares you after you defeat him many times. Galactus only sees those who are significant and sparing them if they’re worthy of it. He promises you a life of fortune and power if you join him.

Carol (based off comic) is a bit of a competitive and also has trust issues with everything she went through. She was labeled to be someone powerful. When her crush proved to be stronger, she started to ask a lot of questions. When she found out you’re harmless, she sees you as her partner.

Cable seems to be very grumpy and people avoided him and it was safe to say that he was taken back. When you punched him so hard that he flew back, he was also in awe. It didn’t help that Wade kept teasing him for it. Norman fell for you even harder than before.  

Namor (this gif cracks me up) is amused by you. He is surprised at how powerful you are when he first meet you but it doesn’t surprise him as you didn’t seem so scared of him. Namor goes to request you to be on his side even far into marrying him.
